name: Krunkr.io
description:
Kruncker.io is a cartoon first person shooter in which you are thrown into the boots of a pixel soldier in the midst of battle. Use your warfare tactics and sharp shooter aim to defeat all of your enemies. Watch cool animations appear on screen as you kill enemies and gain points.
In this real-time multiplayer .io game, you have a selection of up to 5 guns to choose from. Jump into a game and prove that you are the ultimate soldier. For added fun, get out your spray gun and spray paint on walls or on your enemies! Have fun!
